title: Novel electrocardiogram uses signals from ear and hand to check heart rhythm

title_detail.value: Novel electrocardiogram uses signals from ear and hand to check heart rhythm

summary: A novel electrocardiogram (ECG) method uses signals from the ear and hand to check heart rhythm. The ECG does not require two hands and could be used by drivers, athletes, and the military.

summary_detail.value: A novel electrocardiogram (ECG) method uses signals from the ear and hand to check heart rhythm. The ECG does not require two hands and could be used by drivers, athletes, and the military.
